actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Natural Gas Act to require that notice of an application for a certificate of convenience and necessity be published in the newspaper.

summary.text: Requires that notice of an application for a certificate of convenience and necessity under the Natural Gas Act be published in the newspaper.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Natural Gas Act to require that notice of an application for a certificate of convenience and necessity be published in the newspaper.
